tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE virtual_background_settings (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    background_image_url VARCHAR(255),
    blur_level INT,
    brightness_level INT,
    contrast_level INT
)

CREATE TABLE customization_options (
    option_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    option_name VARCHAR(50),
    option_value TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES virtual_background_settings(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_background_preferences (
  preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  selected_background_id INT NOT NULL,
  selected_option_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES virtual_background_settings(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (selected_background_id) REFERENCES virtual_background_settings(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (selected_option_id) REFERENCES background_customization_options(option_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customization_options (
	option_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	option_name VARCHAR(50),
	option_value VARCHAR(255),
	setting_id INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (setting_id) REFERENCES virtual_background_settings(setting_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
	profile_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	user_id INT,
	profile_name VARCHAR(50),
	user_bio TEXT,
	FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_preferences(user_id)
);
